Detailed Description

Base class for MatrixWriteOperators.

Author:
Lee Netherton
A MatrixWriteOperator is a class which will perform a write operation on a matrix. The MatrixWriteOperator class is never instantiated directly, but serves as a base for derived operator classes. It provides basic write operatons for its derivatives.

Definition at line 100 of file matrix_operator.h.
